JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you want to play a key role in ensuring a smoothly run supply chain in one of the world’s most famous loudspeaker manufacturers?

Dynaudio, the legendary Danish speaker maker, is looking for a new Demand Planning Specialist to work at our HQ in Skanderborg, Denmark.

 

About the job

The purpose of this position is to connect the internal Supply Chain’s abilities with the customers’ demands and make ends meet.

More specifically your responsibilities include:

  • Collect and analyse demand forecast form customers
  • Coordinate with planning, procurement, production team and work out MPS then update forecast commitment to customers
  • Prepare and maintain relevant S&OP reports
  • Process orders in Dynamics365
  • Proactively solve order issues

 

About the department

Dynaudio is in an exciting development, and we experience an increasing demand, meaning extra demand on our supply chain. You will become part of our Sales Coordination and Demand Planning Team, where we work with independent areas of responsibility but ensure that we can support and help each other. You will join a team of colleagues, where communication and sharing information is a key factor for success.

 

About you

Demand Forecast Management, Supply Forecast, Order Management & Order processing are probably well-known phrases in your vocabulary.

To succeed in this role, you need to have:

  • 5 years’ experience in demand planning, sales operations management or similar in a manufacturing company
  • Experience in S&OP processes
  • Solid knowledge of supply chain and operations management
  • Skills in supply chain data analysis and decision making based on data
  • Solid communication skills and proven track record in communicating with customers globally

 

Since you are in contact with partners and customers daily, you’ll need to be comfortably fluent in English in both writing and speaking, English is also our company language.

If you are proficient in German or Chinese, it will be considered an advantage.

 

About what we offer

An exciting job in an international company with good professional and personal development opportunities, and where you influence the company´s further development.

You’ll have a chance to listen to the music you love on some truly amazing speakers and even get to see behind the scenes on how they’re made, tested and designed in-house at the factory.

The salary is negotiated individually at a level that corresponds to the position requirements and your qualifications.

If you have any questions, please reach out to our Director of Supply Chain, Eva Guo via evagu@dynaudio.com or +45 8793 6256.

 

About Dynaudio

Dynaudio is one of the world\'s largest speaker manufacturers. Founded in 1977 in Skanderborg, Denmark, we have more than 40 years of experience in producing high-end speakers.

Today, Dynaudio exports to 80 countries around the world and has received awards everywhere for the products. Dynaudio today has approx. 300 employees. Development and production take place in Skanderborg, where Dynaudio, in collaboration with VW and other highly regarded car manufacturers, also develops sound systems. Dynaudio has extreme quality requirements and is highly certified.

Late in 2014, Goertek Inc., China, acquired the majority shares of Dynaudio. Goertek Inc. is world leader in the development and manufacturing of 3D glasses and Bluetooth equipment. They’re also the top producer of microphones, flat screens and micro loudspeakers/transducers in the world.
